title: The Ghoul (restored, colorized) (1933, horror, imdb score: 5.9)

sources.title: The Ghoul (restored, colorized) (1933, horror, imdb score: 5.9)
sources.description: The Ghoul is a 1933 British horror film directed by T. Hayes Hunter and starring Boris Karloff . The cast also features Harold Huth , Dorothy Hyson , Ernest Thesiger , Cedric Hardwicke , and Ralph Richardson in his first credited film role.
